fields.description:
Android: Accessibility : Accessibility does not work on Slider Control

Steps to reproduce:
1. Run Acceptance Access_1109 on Accessibility module.
2. Touch the second slider (with LVH defined in sequence) 

Expected:
he device reads aloud LVH(This is slider2 label , This is slider2 value , This is slider2 hint) followed by 'seek control'+value(android) and value+ adjustable

Actual:
Device just reads "clicked"
fields.summary: Android: Accessibility : Accessibility does not work on Slider Control
fields.environment:
Android Version : 4.0.4
SDK: 3.1.0.v20130327135307
CLI version : 3.0.25-alpha
OS : MAC OSX 10.8.2
